About Me

My bio and some professional Experience

BIO

I'm a Software Engineer currently working at Optum. I graduated Brandeis University in 2016, where I earned my BS in Computer Science and minors in Business and Economics. I've worked on many different projects spanning across many different programming langauges and frameworks. I'm almost always looking for more and exciting work on the side, so please don't hesitate to contact me if you're looking for an engineer to help with a project. Outside of programming, I like to play sports, watch TV and documentaries, and hang out with friends and family.

Optum Inc, Employer eServices Portal

Full Stack Engineer

A web application where users with UnitedHealth Group/Optum insurance can manage their employees healthcare plans. Integrated the ability for users to request temporary medical id cards, aided the content migration from Vignette to Adobe Experience Manager, and have incorporating optum ID, Optum's umbrella identity management system, into many different parts of the portal.

Optum Inc, Cirrus Software Engineer

Backend Software Engineer

A large-scale healthcare solution that automated claim adjudication, benefit coverage, and member administration. Developed RESTful APIs used for claims processing, searching members' claims, and member profile managment under platform's Member microservice domain.

Optum Inc, OptumCare Delivery Portal

Test Automation Engineer

A portal where patients facilitates communication between patients and physicians for primary care, specialty care, and post-acute care. Generated automation test scripts to team's API services used to search for patient and physician information including history, PCPs, and demographics.
